text: “Koma pamene Isa (Yesu) adazindikira mwa iwo kusakhulupirira adati: “Ndani akhale athandizi anga kwa Allah (popitiriza kufalitsa Chipembedzo Chake)?” Ophunzira ake adati: “Ife ndife athandizi a Allah (pofalitsa Chipembedzo Chake). Takhulupirira Allah; ndipo ikira umboni kuti ife ndithu ndi odzipereka kwa Allah (Asilamu).”
